derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective): from Latin laureatus, from laurea 'laurel wreath', from laurus 'laurel'

means.word_mean: 1. someone honored for great achievements; figuratively someone crowned with a laurel wreath
1. worthy of the greatest honor or distinction;
